sentence: The actor's slippers had been washed.
Chinese: 演员的拖鞋被洗干净了。
Italian: Le pantofole dell'attore sono state lavate.
target1: Now he has put on the slippers.
target2: Now the actor has put on the slippers.

sentence: The cleaner was watering the flower when the man brought her shocking news.
Chinese: 男人来给她传达新闻的时候，清洁工正在浇花。
Italian: L'addetta alle pulizie stava innaffiando i fiori quando l'uomo le ha svelato la scioccante notizia.
target1: Now she has dropped the watering can.
target2: Now the cleaner has dropped the watering can.

sentence: The teenager found a radio on his way home.
Chinese: 少年在回家的路上发现了一台收音机。
Italian: La pattinatrice ha trovato una radio mentre tornava a casa.
target1: Now he has picked up the radio.
target2: Now the teenager has picked up the radio.
